meanings.definition: Give a brief statement of the main points of (something).
meanings.sent1: She summarized the story for her friend in just a few sentences.
meanings.sent2: The teacher summarized the lesson at the end of class.
meanings.sent3: The cat summarized its day by napping in the sun.
meanings.sent4: His smile summarized his gratitude better than any words could.
meanings.sent5: The map summarized the entire journey with a single red line.

meanings.definition: Present the main points in a concise form.
meanings.sent1: He summarized the report to save time during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The article summarized the research findings in a clear manner.
meanings.sent3: The joke summarized the situation in a hilarious way.
meanings.sent4: Her painting summarized the beauty of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The chart summarized the data with colorful bars and numbers.
